columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the CDN front door profile.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Kind of the profile. Used by portal to differentiate traditional CDN profile and new AFD profile.

columns.name: resource_state
columns.description: Resource status of the CDN front door profile.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning status of the CDN front door profile.

columns.name: front_door_id
columns.description: The ID of the front door.

columns.name: origin_response_timeout_seconds
columns.description: Send and receive timeout on forwarding request to the origin. When timeout is reached, the request fails and returns.

columns.name: region
columns.description: The Azure region where the resource is located.

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: The resource group in which the resource is located.
